alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 11:35PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Thunderstorms with heavy rain will cause minor flooding in the following counties... Rusk...Chippewa... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1131 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding in the area. 1.5 to 2 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Ladysmith, Bruce, Hawkins, Weyerhaeuser, Sheldon, Tony, Conrath, Glen Flora, Ingram, Rusk County Airport and Island Lake. Additional rainfall of 1 inch is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
